verses.text: \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H1961"\w*, \w saying|strong="H1697"\w*,

\w Son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w*, \w set|strong="H7760"\w* \w thy|strong="H7760"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w toward|strong="H1870"\w* Jerusalem, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w drop|strong="H5197"\w* \add thy word\add* \w toward|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* sanctuaries, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w* \w against|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w land|strong="H7704"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Israel;

\w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w say|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Israel, \w Thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*: \w Behold|strong="H2005"\w*, \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w against|strong="H6440"\w* \w thee|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* draw \w forth|strong="H8085"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* sword \w out|strong="H3518"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w its|strong="H3605"\w* sheath, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* cut \w off|strong="H6440"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w thee|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* righteous \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* wicked.

\w Seeing|strong="H7200"\w* \w then|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* cut \w off|strong="H7200"\w* \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w thee|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* righteous \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* wicked, \w therefore|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* sword \w go|strong="H3068"\w* forth \w out|strong="H3518"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w its|strong="H3605"\w* sheath \w against|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* south \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* north:

\w and|strong="H4912"\w* all flesh \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* know \w that|strong="H1931"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w*, \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*, \w have|strong="H3808"\w* drawn forth \w my|strong="H3808"\w* sword \w out|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H3069"\w* \w its|strong="H3808"\w* sheath; \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* return anymore.

Sigh \w therefore|strong="H3068"\w*, \w thou|strong="H1961"\w* son \w of|strong="H3068"\w* man; \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* breaking \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* loins \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* bitterness shalt \w thou|strong="H1961"\w* sigh \w before|strong="H1961"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* eyes.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w*, \w when|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H3478"\w* \w say|strong="H3478"\w* \w unto|strong="H6440"\w* \w thee|strong="H6440"\w*, Wherefore sighest \w thou|strong="H6440"\w*? \w that|strong="H3478"\w* \w thou|strong="H6440"\w* shalt \w say|strong="H3478"\w*, \w Because|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* tidings, \w for|strong="H6440"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w* cometh; \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w every|strong="H7760"\w* heart \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* melt, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H6440"\w* hands \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* feeble, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w every|strong="H7760"\w* spirit \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* faint, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H6440"\w* knees \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* weak \w as|strong="H3389"\w* water: behold, \w it|strong="H7760"\w* cometh, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* \w done|strong="H7760"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H6440"\w* Lord \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*.
\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* word \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H3318"\w* \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H4480"\w*, saying,

Son \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w man|strong="H7563"\w*, prophesy, \w and|strong="H2719"\w* say, \w Thus|strong="H3651"\w* saith \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*: Say, \w A|strong="H3068"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, \w it|strong="H3651"\w* \w is|strong="H7563"\w* sharpened, \w and|strong="H2719"\w* \w also|strong="H3318"\w* furbished;

\w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* sharpened \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w make|strong="H3045"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* slaughter; \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* furbished \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* lightning: \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w then|strong="H3318"\w* \w make|strong="H3045"\w* mirth? \w the|strong="H3605"\w* rod \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* son, \w it|strong="H3588"\w* contemneth \w every|strong="H3605"\w* tree.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w it|strong="H5869"\w* \w is|strong="H1121"\w* given \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* furbished, \w that|strong="H1121"\w* \w it|strong="H5869"\w* \w may|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* handled: \w the|strong="H5869"\w* sword, \w it|strong="H5869"\w* \w is|strong="H1121"\w* sharpened, yea, \w it|strong="H5869"\w* \w is|strong="H1121"\w* furbished, \w to|strong="H1121"\w* give \w it|strong="H5869"\w* into \w the|strong="H5869"\w* hand \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5869"\w* slayer.

Cry \w and|strong="H3027"\w* wail, son \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w man|strong="H3605"\w*; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H3820"\w*, \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* princes \w of|strong="H3027"\w* Israel: \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* \w delivered|strong="H3027"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sword|strong="H3027"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H3820"\w*; \w smite|strong="H1290"\w* \w therefore|strong="H5921"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w thy|strong="H3027"\w* thigh.

\w For|strong="H3068"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* trial; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H1697"\w* \w if|strong="H1961"\w* \w even|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* rod \w that|strong="H3068"\w* contemneth \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w no|strong="H1961"\w* \w more|strong="H1961"\w*? saith \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*.

Thou \w therefore|strong="H1571"\w*, \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w*, \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* smite \w thy|strong="H1121"\w* hands \w together|strong="H1571"\w*; \w and|strong="H1121"\w* let \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* doubled \w the|strong="H3541"\w* third time, \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* deadly wounded: \w it|strong="H2719"\w* \w is|strong="H1571"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* great \w one|strong="H1121"\w* \w that|strong="H1121"\w* \w is|strong="H1571"\w* deadly wounded, \w which|strong="H2719"\w* entereth \w into|strong="H2719"\w* \w their|strong="H1571"\w* chambers.

\w I|strong="H3988"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* set \w the|strong="H3605"\w* threatening \w sword|strong="H1300"\w* \w against|strong="H3605"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* gates, \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* heart \w may|strong="H1961"\w* melt, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* stumblings \w be|strong="H1961"\w* multiplied: \w ah|strong="H3068"\w*! \w it|strong="H1961"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w made|strong="H1961"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w lightning|strong="H1300"\w*, \w it|strong="H1961"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* pointed \w for|strong="H4616"\w* \w slaughter|strong="H2874"\w*.

Gather \w thee|strong="H5414"\w* \w together|strong="H3709"\w*, \w go|strong="H2719"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* right, \w set|strong="H5414"\w* thyself \w in|strong="H3027"\w* array, \w go|strong="H2719"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w left|strong="H5414"\w*, whithersoever \w thy|strong="H5414"\w* face \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w set|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w also|strong="H3478"\w* \w smite|strong="H5606"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* hands \w together|strong="H2199"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w cause|strong="H3651"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* wrath \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w rest|strong="H1961"\w*: \w I|strong="H3588"\w*, \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*, \w have|strong="H1961"\w* spoken \w it|strong="H1931"\w*.
\w The|strong="H5002"\w* word \w of|strong="H7626"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w unto|strong="H1961"\w* \w me|strong="H1961"\w* \w again|strong="H1961"\w*, saying,

\w Also|strong="H1121"\w*, thou \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w*, appoint thee \w two|strong="H5221"\w* ways, \w that|strong="H1931"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* king \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Babylon \w may|strong="H1121"\w* come; \w they|strong="H1931"\w* twain \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* come \w forth|strong="H5221"\w* \w out|strong="H1419"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w one|strong="H7992"\w* land: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* mark \w out|strong="H1419"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* place, mark \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w out|strong="H1419"\w* \w at|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* head \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* way \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w city|strong="H1931"\w*.

\w Thou|strong="H6213"\w* shalt \w appoint|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w way|strong="H5921"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* come \w to|strong="H5921"\w* Rabbah \w of|strong="H8179"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* children \w of|strong="H8179"\w* Ammon, \w and|strong="H2719"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* Judah \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H4616"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* fortified.

\w For|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* Babylon stood \w at|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* parting \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w way|strong="H6440"\w*, \w at|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w head|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* two ways, \w to|strong="H6440"\w* use divination: \w he|strong="H6440"\w* shook \w the|strong="H6440"\w* arrows \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w and|strong="H6440"\w* fro, \w he|strong="H6440"\w* consulted \w the|strong="H6440"\w* teraphim, \w he|strong="H6440"\w* \w looked|strong="H6440"\w* \w in|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* liver.

\w In|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w right|strong="H3068"\w* \w hand|strong="H3709"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* divination \add for\add* Jerusalem, \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w set|strong="H5117"\w* battering rams, \w to|strong="H1696"\w* open \w the|strong="H5221"\w* mouth \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w slaughter|strong="H5221"\w*, \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w lift|strong="H3068"\w* up \w the|strong="H5221"\w* voice \w with|strong="H3068"\w* shouting, \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w set|strong="H5117"\w* battering rams \w against|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* gates, \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w cast|strong="H3068"\w* up mounds, \w to|strong="H1696"\w* build forts.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H1961"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H1961"\w* \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* false divination \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* sight, \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* sworn oaths \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H1961"\w*; \w but|strong="H1961"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w bringeth|strong="H3068"\w* iniquity \w to|strong="H3068"\w* remembrance, \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w taken|strong="H1961"\w*.

Therefore thus saith \w the|strong="H7760"\w* Lord \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*: \w Because|strong="H3027"\w* \w ye|strong="H3318"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* \w made|strong="H7760"\w* \w your|strong="H7760"\w* iniquity \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w be|strong="H3027"\w* remembered, \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w that|strong="H4428"\w* \w your|strong="H7760"\w* transgressions \w are|strong="H1121"\w* uncovered, \w so|strong="H3318"\w* \w that|strong="H4428"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w all|strong="H1254"\w* \w your|strong="H7760"\w* doings \w your|strong="H7760"\w* sins \w do|strong="H1870"\w* appear; \w because|strong="H3027"\w* \w that|strong="H4428"\w* \w ye|strong="H3318"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w come|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* remembrance, \w ye|strong="H3318"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H3027"\w* \w taken|strong="H7760"\w* \w with|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H7760"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w thou|strong="H7760"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* deadly wounded wicked \w one|strong="H1121"\w*, \w the|strong="H7760"\w* prince \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Israel, \w whose|strong="H1121"\w* day \w is|strong="H1870"\w* \w come|strong="H3063"\w*, \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H7760"\w* time \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H7760"\w* iniquity \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H7760"\w* end,

thus saith \w the|strong="H7200"\w* Lord \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*: Remove \w the|strong="H7200"\w* miter, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w take|strong="H5975"\w* \w off|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* crown; \w this|strong="H7200"\w* \add shall be\add* \w no|strong="H7200"\w* \w more|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* same; exalt \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w which|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H1870"\w* low, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* abase \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w which|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H1870"\w* \w high|strong="H7218"\w*.

\w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* overturn, overturn, overturn \w it|strong="H7760"\w*: \w this|strong="H7760"\w* \w also|strong="H3389"\w* \w shall|strong="H6310"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w no|strong="H7760"\w* \w more|strong="H5921"\w*, \w until|strong="H5921"\w* \w he|strong="H3389"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w* \w whose|strong="H8179"\w* \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w is|strong="H1961"\w*; \w and|strong="H6963"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w give|strong="H7760"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \add him\add*.

\w And|strong="H5869"\w* \w thou|strong="H1961"\w*, son \w of|strong="H5869"\w* man, prophesy, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* say, \w Thus|strong="H1961"\w* saith \w the|strong="H2142"\w* Lord \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* concerning \w the|strong="H2142"\w* children \w of|strong="H5869"\w* Ammon, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* concerning \w their|strong="H2142"\w* reproach; \w and|strong="H5869"\w* say \w thou|strong="H1961"\w*, \w A|strong="H3068"\w* sword, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* sword \w is|strong="H1931"\w* drawn, \w for|strong="H5869"\w* \w the|strong="H2142"\w* slaughter \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* furbished, \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w cause|strong="H1961"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* devour, \w that|strong="H1931"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* lightning;

\w while|strong="H3541"\w* \w they|strong="H3651"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w for|strong="H3605"\w* \w thee|strong="H7200"\w* false \w visions|strong="H7200"\w*, \w while|strong="H3541"\w* \w they|strong="H3651"\w* divine lies \w unto|strong="H7200"\w* \w thee|strong="H7200"\w*, \w to|strong="H1540"\w* \w lay|strong="H8610"\w* \w thee|strong="H7200"\w* \w upon|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* necks \w of|strong="H3709"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* wicked \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w are|strong="H6588"\w* deadly wounded, \w whose|strong="H3605"\w* day \w is|strong="H3651"\w* \w come|strong="H2142"\w* \w in|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* time \w of|strong="H3709"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* \w of|strong="H3709"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* end.

Cause \w it|strong="H3117"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* return into its sheath. \w In|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* place where \w thou|strong="H3117"\w* wast created, \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* land \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w thy|strong="H3478"\w* birth, \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* judge thee.
